mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT( so.task_time, '%d' ) as d, COUNT(DISTINCT sos.type_id ) as cou FROM send_orders_subtabulation sos LEFT JOIN send_orders so ON so.id = sos.send_orders_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT( so.task_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{date}, '%Y%m' ) AND sos.distribution_type = 0 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( so.task_time, '%d' )

SELECT DISTINCT so.id, so.plan_id, so.plan_type as plan_type_name, sos.type_id as license, so.operator_schema, wa.`name` AS warehouse_name, so.project_no, so.backup2 AS engineeringAddress FROM send_orders so LEFT JOIN send_orders_subtabulation sos ON so.id = sos.send_orders_id LEFT JOIN warehouse wa ON wa.id = so.warehouse_id WHERE sos.distribution_type = '0' AND DATE_FORMAT( so.task_time, '%Y%m%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{date}, '%Y%m%d' ) GROUP BY so.plan_type,sos.type_id,so.operator_schema,wa.`name`,so.project_no,so.backup2

,project_name ,engineering_address
,site AS project_name ,address AS engineering_address
,eng_name AS project_name ,address AS engineering_address
,eng_name AS project_name ,sampling_addres AS engineering_address
